Panels.name: Cockpit Panel
Panels.description: Built upon the beloved Cockpit v1.0a (Legacy), this successor offers a faster, smoother experience. Crafted from the ground up with a modular design, it's fully customizable to meet users unique needs. Packed with features for owners and users alike, it comes pre-installed with the Multi-service Proxy Module. Plus, enjoy the added versatility of Custom Android WebView Widgets.

Panels.name: Cockpit Panel: Smarters Pro Module
Panels.description: Simplify customization with Cockpit Panel's Smarters Pro Module. Remotely configure services and settings for Smarters Pro, streamlining integration and enhancing user experiences from one intuitive platform.
